script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_pledges_quaternary_sectors CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_quaternary_sectors AS SELECT afps.pledge_id, COALESCE(rs.name, '#') AS sectorname, aswl.id0 AS amp_sector_id, sum(afps.sector_percentage) AS sector_percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(afps.sector_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges_sector afps JOIN ni_all_sectors_with_levels aswl ON afps.amp_sector_id = aswl.amp_sector_id JOIN all_sectors_with_levels ass ON afps.amp_sector_id = ass.amp_sector_id LEFT JOIN amp_sector rs ON rs.amp_sector_id = aswl.id0 WHERE ass.sector_config_name = 'Quaternary' GROUP BY afps.pledge_id, aswl.id0, rs.amp_sector_id;
